data.text:
In the latest episode of

‘Kaun Banega Crorepati’, Amitabh Bachchan shared an interesting chronicle of a hack used by his co-star and exhuberant actress, Waheeda Rehman in Sunil Dutt’s

“Reshma Aur Shera”

Remarkably, Amitabh Bachchan has been winning the hearts of his audience with his exceptional performance in hosting the quiz-based show, Kaun Banega Crorepati.

The show, which aired for the first time in the year 2000, has been loved by television viewers, who love the interesting challenges of the show, as well as the frequent trivia that the senior Bachchan often shares while chatting with the contestants. Something similar happened yet again, as he shared another interesting narrative from his memories.

Bachchan credited his Reshma Aur Shera co-star, Waheeda Rehman for her special makeup hack amid shooting

In the recent episode of KBC, 15, Amitabh, even amid interacting with a contestant on the hot seat, delved onto the topic of makeup, in particular reference to women. The actor, who worked with Waheeda in a number of films such as Kabhie Kabhi, Reshma Aur Shera, Namak Halal among others, shared how the former used to carry a small compact case of makeup during the shooting of her films.

Moreover, he also took a dig at some other actors whom he has seen in his film career, who require four people just to hold a mirror in front of them before going for a shot. In his words:

The Legend went on advocate that Waheeda has her favourite compact that she uses to do all her makeup. She keeps that little compact with her all the time.

There are many such actors who keep four people just to hold their mirror because they always want a full-size mirror before going for the shot, they need to see everything, makeup, outfit, and all are perfect.
